articles.title: McConnell: Biden 'got it wrong again' when he claimed GOP can't say 'what they're for' - Fox News
articles.description: Mitch McConnell responded to President Biden's repeated claim that Republicans cannot verbalize "what they are for" to the American people.
articles.content:

articles.content:
